comment.p: Add principles: pluggability, implementation speed, l10n

section.title: For the Reader
section.p: Readers are the ultimate arbiters of the quality of a documentation system. The best efforts of the writers and hackers are wasted if the documention doesn't help the reader to find the information she needs quickly. The needs of the reader trump all other requirements.
